item.title: Flashing a custom rom on Nexus 4
item.description: Flashing a custom image on an Android mobile could be just fun. But if you don’t know why you want to do it, or do it just because it’s a challenge. Then don’t! The bad and the good I’m only pointing out some of the cons and the pros here. Negative sides An OS image could contain malware; only use community trusted images. If you don’t pay attention you can get malware running as root.
